attributes.action: Ban the manufacture, sale and possesion of half and half football scarves.
attributes.additional_details: Put quite simply, these scarves should have no place in the football stadiums, streets and homes of our great nation.
attributes.background: I would like Parliament to debate this divisive and embarrasing matter. Half and half scarves are a stain on the reputation of every decent, law abiding, money spending football supporter.

rejection.details:
Petitions must call for a specific action that the UK Government or House of Commons is responsible for.

Decisions about the manufacture, sale and possession of football scarves are a matter for private companies and customers, not the Government or House of Commons.
